name: That One Horrible Morning
description:
You have near nearsightedness.

You are deaf.

You have short term memory loss.

....And you are late to work.

As clumsy as you are, you have placed your glasses and hearing aid in elaborate places for no reason.

Gain your senses and rush out to work!

How fast can you complete this?

-Please report any bugs found, in the comments, so we can fix it ASAP! :D

KNOWN BUGS: In a very very very rare occasion, the vision might still be blurry after fixing the spectacle. Please let us know if that happens.
